memberdef.argsstring: (const std::vector< typename F::Elem > &mod, std::vector< typename F::Elem > &val, const F &field)
memberdef.name: PolyMod

detaileddescription.para: Compute the remainder of a polynomial division of val by mod, putting the result in mod.

memberdef.argsstring: (const std::vector< typename F::Elem > &mod, std::vector< typename F::Elem > &val, std::vector< typename F::Elem > &div, const F &field)
memberdef.name: DivMod

detaileddescription.para: Compute the quotient of a polynomial division of val by mod, putting the quotient in div and the remainder in val.

memberdef.argsstring: (std::vector< typename F::Elem > &a, std::vector< typename F::Elem > &b, const F &field)
memberdef.name: GCD

detaileddescription.para: Compute the GCD of two polynomials, putting the result in a. b will be cleared.

memberdef.argsstring: (const std::vector< typename F::Elem > &mod, std::vector< typename F::Elem > &out, const typename F::Elem &param, const F &field)
memberdef.name: TraceMod

detaileddescription.para: Compute the trace map of (param*x) modulo mod, putting the result in out.

memberdef.argsstring: (std::vector< std::vector< typename F::Elem > > &stack, size_t pos, std::vector< typename F::Elem > &roots, bool fully_factorizable, int depth, typename F::Elem randv, const F &field)
memberdef.name: RecFindRoots

detaileddescription.para: One step of the root finding algorithm; finds roots of stack[pos] and adds them to roots. Stack elements >= pos are destroyed.
It operates on a stack of polynomials. The polynomial operated on is stack[pos], where elements of stack with index higher than pos are used as scratch space.
stack[pos] is assumed to be square-free polynomial. If fully_factorizable is true, it is also assumed to have no irreducible factors of degree higher than 1.
This implements the Berlekamp trace algorithm, plus an efficient test to fail fast in case the polynomial cannot be fully factored.

memberdef.argsstring: (const std::vector< typename F::Elem > &poly, typename F::Elem basis, const F &field)
memberdef.name: FindRoots

detaileddescription.para: Returns the roots of a fully factorizable polynomial
This function assumes that the input polynomial is square-free and not the zero polynomial (represented by an empty vector).
In case the square-free polynomial is not fully factorizable, i.e., it has fewer roots than its degree, the empty vector is returned.

memberdef.argsstring: (const std::vector< typename F::Elem > &syndromes, size_t max_degree, const F &field)
memberdef.name: BerlekampMassey

memberdef.argsstring: (std::vector< typename F::Elem > &osyndromes, typename F::Elem data, const F &field)
memberdef.name: AddToOddSyndromes
